tool_description: Maps theoretical and actual power curves for wind turbines based on manufacturer specifications and real performance data to enable accurate power output predictions.

turbine_model.description: Wind turbine model identifier or specification

rated_power.description: Turbine rated power capacity in kW

air_density.description: Site air density in kg/m³ for density correction

wind_speeds.description: Wind speed points for power curve generation

actual_power_data.description: Historical power output data for curve calibration

curve_smoothing.description: Apply smoothing to reduce power curve noise

error_messages: Invalid turbine specifications: Cut-in speed must be less than rated speed, which must be less than cut-out speed.
Invalid rated power: Rated power must be a positive number greater than 0 kW.
Invalid performance factor: Performance factor must be between 0.8 and 1.0.
Air density out of range: Air density must be between 1.0 and 1.5 kg/m³.
Data array length mismatch: Wind speeds and actual power data arrays must have equal length when both provided.
Invalid wind speed range: Wind speeds must be non-negative and within reasonable range (0-50 m/s).
usage: Provide turbine specifications including cut-in, rated, and cut-out speeds along with rated power. Optionally include historical power data for curve calibration and site-specific conditions.

theoretical_curve.description: Theoretical power curve as wind speed-power pairs

calibrated_curve.description: Site-calibrated power curve incorporating actual performance data

curve_coefficients.description: Mathematical coefficients for power curve interpolation

capacity_factor.description: Estimated annual capacity factor based on curve analysis
